summary: A merchant ship's crew tries to survive the loneliness of the sea and the coming of war.
cast: John Wayne|Thomas Mitchell|Ian Hunter|Barry Fitzgerald|Wilfrid Lawson|John Qualen|Mildred Natwick|Ward Bond|Arthur Shields|Joe Sawyer|J.M. Kerrigan|Rafaela Ottiano|Carmen Morales|Jack Pennick|Bob Perry|Constant Franke|David Hughes|Constantine Romanoff|Danny Borzage|Harry Tenbrook|Cyril McLaglen|Douglas Walton|Billy Bevan|Mary Carewe|Bing Conley|Lita Cortez|Jane Crowley|Carmen D'Antonio|Lowell Drew|James Flavin|Soledad Gonzales|Guy Kingsford|Judith Linden|Elena Martínez|Tina Menard|Art Miles|Lionel Pape|Luanne Robb|Ky Robinson|Maureen Roden-Ryan|Lee Shumway|Leslie Sketchley|Wyndham Standing|Roger Steele|Sammy Stein|Blue Washington|Harry Woods
title: Hombres intrépidos
